mapper.select: select ADDRESS_ID addressId,USER_ID userId,USER_NAME userName,DEFAULT_FLG defaultFlg,ZIP zip,COUNTRY country,CITY city,ADDRESS address,PHONE phone,CELL_PHONE cellPhone,EMAIL email,CREATE_DATE createDate,UPDATE_DATE updateDate,DEL_FLG delFlg from BRN_USER_DETAIL where ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId}
mapper.update: update BRN_USER_DETAIL set USER_ID = #{userId} ,USER_NAME = #{userName} ,DEFAULT_FLG = #{defaultFlg} ,ZIP = #{zip} ,COUNTRY = #{country} ,CITY = #{city} ,ADDRESS = #{address} ,PHONE = #{phone} ,CELL_PHONE = #{cellPhone} ,EMAIL = #{email} ,UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId} and UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}
update BRN_USER_DETAIL set UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,DEL_FLG = 1 where UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} and DEL_FLG = 0
